content: The people of Red and Orange have always been friendly towards one another. Our nations are natural allies, so let us continue this alliance by supplying weapons to each other.
We urge you to desist from your attempted expansion into Purple.
How do you feel about establishing agreements on defense and security cooperation? We can support each other and it'll make us both stronger.
I want to work together for a peaceful world. Let us make progress together.

action: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship
